title: The Legacy of the Snake
description: Heath Cabot-Pierce has inherited his grandfather's property in Colorado. But he's also inherited a magic portal to the land of Fairy, and the repercussions of everything Grampa Cabot did there in his misspent youth. With the help of a duck, a fish, some ants and a talking horse named Bob, Heath sets out on a seemingly impossible quest to win the hand of the lovely and insatiable Princess Elena, whose father really, really, doesn't like him.
author: Elizabeth Jewell
